Sentencas: The solid-oxide electrolyte galvanic cells method has been employed in order to obtain the thermodynamic properties of some perovskite-type materials based on lanthanum strontium manganite and lanthanum strontium ferrite manganite.
Titulo: Thermodynamic properties of some perovskite type oxides used as SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: The relative partial molar free energies, enthalpies and entropies of oxygen dissolution in the perovskite phase, as well as the partial pressures of oxygen have been obtained in the temperature range of 1073-1273 K.
Titulo: Thermodynamic properties of some perovskite type oxides used as SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: By solid state coulometric titration, the initial composition of the perovskite phase was altered under controlled conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic properties of some perovskite type oxides used as SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: The results evidence the influence of the oxygen relative stoichiometry change on the thermodynamic properties.
Titulo: Thermodynamic properties of some perovskite type oxides used as SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: The effect of the iron content and of the overall A-site stoichiometry is also discussed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic properties of some perovskite type oxides used as SOFC cathode materials

Sentencas: Broadening the potentialities of solid state EMF techniques, the method was proved very useful in thermodynamic studies when searching improved cathode materials used in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Thermodynamic properties of some perovskite type oxides used as SOFC cathode materials
